underlying_goal: To refactor the dotfiles by replacing hardcoded directory paths with configurable environment variables and update all related aliases, scripts, and documentation.
primary_success: Claude flawlessly executed a multi-file refactoring plan, correctly updating shell scripts and documentation, and even caught and fixed a small, unrelated typo in one of the files before committing.
brief_summary: Following a user-provided plan, Claude refactored the dotfiles to use environment variables for standard directories instead of hardcoded paths. It updated `zshrc.sh`, `aliases.sh`, a migration script, and `CLAUDE.md`. After successfully running all verification steps, it noticed and fixed a stray character before committing and pushing the changes.
